name: estimator
description: Calculates expectation values of quantum operators.

circuits.description: One or more parameterized or non-parameterized QuantumCircuit.

parameters.description: Parameters of quantum circuits, specifying the order in which values will be bound.

circuit_indices.description: A list of circuit indices. It should have the same length as observable_indices and parameter_values.

observable_indices.description: A list of observable indices. It should have the same length as circuit_indices and parameter_values.

parameter_values.description: Concrete parameters to be bound. It should have the same length as circuit_indices and observable_indices.

transpile_options.description: A collection of key-value pairs passed to the transpiler.

run_options.description: A collection of key-value pairs identifying the execution options, such as shots.

value.description: Estimated expectation values. This is a numpy array. The i-th element is calculated using the circuit and observable indexed by the i-th circuit_indices and i-th observable_indices, and bound with i-th parameter_values.
